context: A scenario involving certain signal transitions and their corresponding responses governed by specific time intervals

MTL_expressions.description: The transition action when the value of the signal 'rSnn4GBSub' goes out of the bound (2044, 2391), and the 'lJaHE9gY' signal remains larger than 5.7

propositions.description: The value of 'rSnn4GBSub' signal is not between 2044 and 2391
The value of 'lJaHE9gY' signal is greater than 5.7

MTL_expressions.description: In the subsequent 46 time units, the value of signal 'U_dTx6' shall be in the interval [2, 4]

propositions.description: The value of 'U_dTx6' signal is between 2 and 4

MTL_expressions.description: The value of signal 'U_dTx6' always remains in interval [2, 4] for every moment in the following 8 time units

dependency_sequence.dependency_description: 'exp_02' depends on the conditions defined in 'exp_01'
'exp_03' depends on the conditions defined in 'exp_02'
